overview.title: About me
overview.description: I'm a software engineer passionate about developing innovative technological solutions that solve complex problems. With more than 3 years working as a Developer. I've been working on challenging projects that have allowed me to improve my technical skills in languages ​​such as Java, C#, JavaScript and Typescript. I have experience in agile approaches and multidisciplinary collaboration aiming to deliver high quality products. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a professional.
